src:
Keren! Begini Aksi Boyband SuperM di Video Keselamatan Pesawat
04 Nov 2019, 12:48 by Kris Fathoni W


SuperM membintangi video keselamatan di pesawat Korean Air. (Foto: dok. Twitter)

Jakarta - Video keselamatan di pesawat maskapai Korean Air dijamin menyita perhatian penumpang, khususnya pencinta K-pop. Isinya aksi boyband SuperM!Seperti diberitakan oleh Allkpop.com, video keselamatan itu semakin beda dari biasa karena juga melibatkan sosok kondang lain yakni BoA, yang mengisi suara video tersebut sebagai narator.Soompi.com menyebut, video keselamatan yang dibintangi oleh SuperM ini akan tayang pertama kalinya dalam penerbangan dari Incheon, Korea ke Manila, Filipina pada 5 November pukul 7.45 waktu setempat.Dalam video keselamatan tersebut, SuperM tampil energik bagaikan penampilan video musik K-pop pada umumnya tanpa melupakan unsur pesan keamanan dalam video keselamatan pada umumnya."Kami berusaha untuk tampil beda dari stereotype bahwa 'keamanan' itu kaku dan membosankan. Kami berharap format video musik bari ini bisa memaksimalkan tingkat keamanan," kata seorang sumber dari Korean Air seperti dikutip Soompi.com.Penasaran seperti apa aksi boyband yang dikenal sebagai 'Avengers of K-Pop' bentukan SM Entertainment tersebut? Simak video keselamatannya di bawah ini:

[Gambas:Youtube]


Simak Video "Jalan Terjal Debut 'Jopping' SuperM"

[Gambas:Video 20detik]

(krs/sym)
text:
Cool! Here's the SuperM Boyband Action in Airplane Safety Videos
04 Nov 2019, 12:48 by Kris Fathoni W


SuperM starred in a safety video on a Korean Air plane. (Photo: dock. Twitter)

Jakarta - Safety videos on Korean Air's planes are guaranteed to seize the attention of passengers, especially K-pop lovers. The contents of the SuperM boyband action! As reported by Allkpop.com, the safety video is increasingly different from the usual because it also involves another famous figure, BoA, who fills the sound of the video as a narrator. the first time on a flight from Incheon, Korea to Manila, Philippines on November 5 at 7:45 local time. In the safety video, SuperM appeared as energetic as a typical K-pop music video appearance without forgetting the element of the security message in the safety video in general. "We trying to be different from the stereotype that 'security' is rigid and boring. We hope that the new music video format can maximize the level of security, "a source from Korean Air was quoted as saying by Soompi.com. What kind of boy group action is known as' Avengers of K-Pop 'formed by SM Entertainment? Check out the safety video below:

[Gambas: Youtube]


Check out the SuperM Jopping Debut Road Video

[Gambas: 20sec video]

(krs / sym)
